jobs.title: Internal Tools Developer
accomplishments: Scripted in Python and C# to batch common operations on thousands of game assets at a time
Setup and updated Nintendo Switch development kits for artist and development use
Troubleshooted hardware and software issues for group of two hundred artists

sectionAccomplishments: Collaborated on a team of eleven people to expand upon a existing project in order to develope a website for satellite products
Developed software in an Agile environment with user stories and two week sprints
Met with the team lead for each story to finalize details, create acceptance tests, time estimates, and subtasks
Performed code reviews to ensure story acceptance criteria has been fulfilled and proper structure was adhered to
Transformed prototype pages into fully-fledged components by connecting AngularJS controllers to the backend via RESTful APIs
Conveyed meaning by using FontAwesome Icons and Glyphicons wherever it made sense
Applied and maintained a consistent theme throughout the site by utilizing Twitter Bootstrap
Created, updated and tested REST endpoints that persisted and retrieved data using Spring IO, Java and Hibernate
Optimized SQL database storage and queries resulting in 30% faster response times
Communicated with other microservices using JAXB Objects and a ActiveMQ message broker
Mapped Java Domains objects to PostGreSql database tables using Hibernate JPA
Prevented software regression by expanding upon the existing automated unit and integration tests written with JUnit and Mockito

jobs.title: Software Developer
